placeholder.TMPCMD: sh -c 'echo TMPJOB was not supposed to run >> TMPLOGSDIR/ERROR.TMPJOB.err'

file_setup.TMPCMD: sh -c 'mkdir -m 777 -p /TMPLOGSDIR/; if TMPSHAREBOOL ; then mkdir -m 777 -p /TMPSHAREDIR/; fi; { ls -l /TMPCODEDIR/*py && mkdir -m 777 -p /TMPDATADIR/ && sleep 3; } >TMPLOGSDIR/TMPJOB.log 2>&1; if TMPSHAREBOOL ; then cd /TMPLOGSDIR/.. && rsync -aR TMPLOGSPATH/TMPJOB.log /TMPSHAREDIR/ ; fi'

checker.TMPCMD: sh -c '{ cd /TMPCODEDIR/ && python3 /TMPCODEDIR/check_utilities.py TMPSRC TMPOPTS && if TMPSHAREBOOL ; then cd /TMPDATADIR/.. && rsync -aR TMPDATAPATH/TMPSRC/ /TMPSHAREDIR/; fi; } >TMPLOGSDIR/TMPJOB.log 2>&1; if TMPSHAREBOOL ; then cd /TMPLOGSDIR/.. && rsync -aR TMPLOGSPATH/TMPJOB.log /TMPSHAREDIR/ ; fi; '

fetcher.TMPCMD: sh -c '{ cd /TMPDATADIR/TMPALIASDIR && ls -l file_metadata.json && python3 /TMPCODEDIR/fetch_utilities.py file_metadata.json TMPOPTS && if TMPSHAREBOOL ; then cd /TMPDATADIR/.. && rsync -aR TMPDATAPATH/TMPALIASDIR/ /TMPSHAREDIR/ && cd TMPDATAPATH/ && find TMPALIASDIR -maxdepth 1 -type f ! -name '*.json' -delete; fi; } >TMPLOGSDIR/TMPJOB.log 2>&1; if TMPSHAREBOOL ; then cd /TMPLOGSDIR/.. && rsync -aR TMPLOGSPATH/TMPJOB.log /TMPSHAREDIR/ ; fi;'

tabler.TMPCMD: sh -c '{ cd /TMPDATADIR/TMPALIASDIR && python3 /TMPCODEDIR/table_utilities.py TMPCHUNK file_metadata.json TMPOPTS && if TMPSHAREBOOL ; then cd /TMPDATADIR/.. && rsync -aR --exclude='*.rawline.*' TMPDATAPATH/TMPALIASDIR/TMPFILES /TMPSHAREDIR/ && cd TMPDATAPATH/TMPALIASDIR && rm TMPCHUNK ; fi; } >TMPLOGSDIR/TMPJOB.log 2>&1; if TMPSHAREBOOL ; then cd /TMPLOGSDIR/.. && rsync -aR TMPLOGSPATH/TMPJOB.log /TMPSHAREDIR/ ; fi;'

mapper.TMPCMD: sh -c '{ python3 /TMPCODEDIR/conv_utilities.py /TMPDATADIR/TMPEDGEPATH TMPOPTS && if TMPSHAREBOOL ; then cd /TMPDATADIR/.. && rsync -aR --exclude='*.edge.*' TMPDATAPATH/TMPFILES /TMPSHAREDIR/ && cd TMPDATAPATH && rm TMPFILES ; fi; } >TMPLOGSDIR/TMPJOB.log 2>&1; if TMPSHAREBOOL ; then cd /TMPLOGSDIR/.. && rsync -aR TMPLOGSPATH/TMPJOB.log /TMPSHAREDIR/ ; fi; '

next_step_caller.TMPCMD: sh -c '{ python3 /TMPCODEDIR/workflow_utilities.py TMPNEXTSTEP TMPOPTS -p TMPSTART && sleep 3; } >TMPLOGSDIR/TMPJOB.log 2>&1; if TMPSHAREBOOL ; then cd /TMPLOGSDIR/.. && rsync -aR TMPLOGSPATH/TMPJOB.log /TMPSHAREDIR/ ; fi;'
